title: Three New Features in Figma Buzz Empower Designers and Marketers to Scale Brand Assets with Precision

paragraphs.content: Figma has introduced three key updates to Figma Buzz: configurable templates built on design systems, plugin integrations, and video trimming capabilities. These enhancements, announced in late 2025, enable marketing teams to customize branded assets efficiently while maintaining strict design system adherence. By connecting templates to component properties and variables, users can toggle brand modes like colors or campaigns via a new Variable switcher without sifting through variations.

paragraphs.content: The updates respond directly to user feedback for greater customization and control in asset creation. Plugins now provide seamless access to digital asset management, translation, and animation tools directly within Buzz. Video trimming allows precise editing for collages or ads, building on existing import/export features to eliminate external tool switches.

sections.title: Configurable Templates and Plugins Streamline On-Brand Workflows

paragraphs.content: Configurable templates leverage design system variables, allowing marketers to switch elements like layouts or logos effortlessly. Organization and Enterprise admins can disable unapproved Community templates to enforce brand standards. Plugins integrate apps for inserting approved images, localizing content, and adding animations or QR codes without leaving the canvas.
